description: This file contains unit tests for the TextFragment and TextSegmentIterator classes, part of the core module in the WPEFramework project. It verifies parsing, string handling, and iterator functionality.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a segment of text, with methods for string manipulation, comparison, and trimming.

classes.name: TextSegmentIterator
classes.description: An iterator class for traversing segments of a TextFragment based on delimiters.

methods.name: operator==
methods.description: Equality comparison between TextFragment and buffer.

methods.name: operator!=
methods.description: Inequality comparison between TextFragment and buffer.

methods.name: ReverseFind
methods.description: Finds the position of a substring from the end.
